title: Shut the Box Game for 4 Players, Wooden Table Game Family Travel Game Traditional Pub Dice Games for Adults Educational Table Dice Game for Kids Age 3 4 5 6 +
features: [Shut the Box game for 4 players] - Vingahouse Shut The Box board game allow up to 4 players, each side has 10 wooden board printed with number, players can roll the dice and then count and flip the board according to the number of points on the dice. This wooden game is a fun and traditional board game to train children's arithmetic and logical thinking skills

[High quality material] - The Shut the Box board games is made of lime wood with a smooth and burr-free surface, All edges are hand sanded and the numbers are all with clearly printed, safe and comfortable for children to play; The board is covered with green felt to reduces the noise caused by rolling the dice and there is 4 rubber mats on the bottom of the play board to prevent the table from scratching when slide around

[Family Board Game] - This classic board game suitable as entertainment for party or educational games with families. This board game measures 21.5 x 21.5 x 3.5 cm, lightweight and compact for taking with you when camping, travelling, picnics and parties; come with a storage bag which convenient to bring the Shut the Box game to any where to played with family and friends and get a wonderful memory together;

[Maths Games Educational Toys] - This board game is a Maths training toy to train your brain for maths calculation skills and reaction time; children can learn numbers and mathematical thinking during playing the Shut the Box game; this is the ideal educational puzzle toy board games for children aged 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8

[Perfect Gifts for Kids] - This Shut the Box is a favourite board game for decades; Vingahouse Shut the Box Toy with beautiful package that you can choose it as a gifts for your child's birthday, Children's Day, Halloween, Christmas other festivals
description: Product Description VingaHouse Shut the Box - Fun games for a party Toys for children to play and learn How to play VingaHouse Shut the Box Game? 1. Roll the dice and the game begins 2. Add up the points of the two dice and turn over the number card 3. You can directly turn over a number card that corresponds to the point 4. You can also turn over several cards so that the total corresponds to the number of points rolled.
